title: Employee App
description: This angular application requests an array of employees from a json file, then populates a table with employee information. The table can be filtered by name and sorted by name and id. Clicking an employee's name routes to a detail view for the selected employee.

title: Contact Book
description: This angular application requests an array of contacts from a serverless function built with Netlify edge functions & express.js. Once the angular service receives a response, the response is referenced to populate the panel with all contacts, then the profile with the applied contact.
